data.name: Incredibox Tracks
data.detailed_description: This tracklist is a remastered collection of the 8 versions of Incredibox (2009 - 2020). Each musical style has been rearranged by Incredible Polo, the musician of our team. Plunge back into every atmospheres of your favorite app by listening an eclectic tracklist, a bracing blend of jazz grooves, hip-hop beats, radiant pop, dancefloor vibes, samba rhythms, trap waves, joyful indian music and cyberpunk melancholy... Guys, thank you so much for believing in us since day one, keep on making crazy beats and keep sharing them around! ðŸ˜‰ ðŸ”Š
